topic.title: Ghost on Zeronet
topic.body:
There is a way to use the CMS [Ghost](https://ghost.org/) on a zeronet blog?
Ghost uses [node.js]( https://nodejs.org/en/), based on Javascript

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
> [zblocker](#comment_2_12nxR3iURm6XpA6ZJCxpDyUgSofKWBhpjg): tell me how many programmers here???

I am learning C++

1_1B5iBCuHQgbGdgTJmM2A2pZNVfpfp3EU5u.body:
> [punkcoder](#comment_2_1ACc4pa2pJam33SkSE1zF1seF3LQKWR24v): My guess is no, since there is no backing for node, all sites are distributed via static content... if you are looking for something to help you may want to look at jekyll (https://jekyllrb.com/) or hugo (https://gohugo.io/). HTH

So, I have to create an empty website and then copy the installation file of jekyll or hugo?

> [mi6agent](#comment_20_14YdhMiNAG8LDichYEQvyZZboGL8bSeZEu): Holy fucking shit why did no one warn me there might be ghosts on here? [...]

I will ask on ghost forum.
When I will have an answer to this question, I will write a message on this post

This is the answer:
```If it can output to static HTML and JavaScript, it should theoretically work in ZeroNet. Try to remove any links to the clearnet though(plugins, libraries, fonts, etc)```

> [ooo7](#comment_1_12WAPD3EzET8DYTdKmaymGznXppM5apAKu): "它是我们的责任，迫使所有的人类接受七诺亚法律，如果没有 ~ 他们会被杀死。"~ 拉比伊扎克 · 金斯伯格"有人可能称之为共产主义，但我叫它是什么︰ 犹太教。"~ 拉比斯蒂芬 · 韦斯

Speak English!

> [jewishrabbi](#comment_5_1EDcVDrJx9dqRdYzBeyUyXVAbq1rVTCNW4): Shalom.היהודים שולטים בעולם.ללא-יהודים אינם בני אדם.

Interesting xD

2_1PTaJe3LLeB5Pfxq8KjcpQSPcSK1PQqsQs.body: Because Zeronet is a place where everybody can speak freely

1_1DCTA8rrSFeKX7CzieU3CYwCjGZ2hYvamb.body: If you haven't got the private key or "user.json" you can't recover your ZeroID

1_1KNaemLKhPio4dCJiSvi81Q24AWUycwV3T.body: Update **user.json** and you will recover your account

1_19Z8aJ32x4pE2iGvVssPJazJgpGe5L32rq.body:
> [nazi](#comment_1_14QD2BAZenH8vwW6JrFsFj337KL2KERH3v): RacistTalk – The Forum for Mentally Retarded People

The description is so true xD

4_16UbJDyboDaAjW5fiZouKWpPJztpt43kEj.body: You can't post pic on ZeroTalk
